instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message:
A1278 2011
with ac adapter work ok
with ac adapter and battery work ok
with only battery run slow. When write something, letters appears 4,5 seg. later. Any idea?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Cannot find restore button in el Capitan to create ASD148. It is possible to do it with el Capitan or I need older version?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message:
Restore option is in the top menu.......

[url]https://support.apple.com/kb/PH22244?locale=en_US[/url]

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: I already know it will be VD0R issue. Check Q5300/10 and resistors for corrosion.

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: U5410 seems bad but I dont know what it does. Could be the problem?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Yes, replace... It is the current sensor for PPBUS_G3H........

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: It also is bad but does not cause running slow normally. Corrosion around Q5300/10 is also likely.

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Yes Duke. You are 100% right. Was bad Q5300. Now works ok. SMC miss SMC_PBUS_VSENSE and run slow, but why? What SMC_PBUS_VSENSE says to SMC?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Ask the team that designed the SMC firmware. Just fix it and be happy it works.

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: U5410 is bad and no where to solder. All pads are missing. I tested the board and works fine. Do you think U5410 is important to put?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Current sensor which should be present. Time to run a few wires.

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Well, it runs fine, but when I put youtube fan runs at max. Could be bad U5410?

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message:
Read answer from duke 1 post up. 
He already gave the answer

threads.title: With battery run slow
threads.message: Run ASD, check sensors and repair U5410.
